mapper.select: select count(imr.id) from iam_member_role imr left join iam_role ir on imr.role_id = ir.id left join hiam_label_rel hlr ON ir.id = hlr.data_id and hlr.data_type = 'ROLE' left join iam_label il ON hlr.label_id = il.id where il.name = 'TENANT_ADMIN' and imr.source_type = 'organization' and imr.member_type = 'user' and imr.source_id = #{organizationId} and imr.member_id = #{userId}
